summary: This document is a forwarded email from November 7, 2019, containing a link to a New York Post article titled 'Paging Epstein coverup: Airport says message was a mistake.' The email appears to be sent to an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, suggesting it is related to the Epstein case coverage or investigation.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The email is addressed to this individual, indicating they are a prosecutor in the Southern District of New York, likely involved in the Epstein case.

events.title: New York Post article publication
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article titled 'Paging Epstein coverup: Airport says message was a mistake,' which is linked in the email.

keyFacts: An email dated November 7, 2019, forwards a New York Post article link to an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The article's title suggests it concerns an airport message related to an 'Epstein coverup' that was later called a mistake.
The correspondence indicates ongoing public and media interest in the Epstein case as of late 2019, with information being shared with federal prosecutors.
